forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds NE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 10C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low near 45F. Winds SE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 57F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Windy at times with rain likely. Low 47F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 53F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 52F. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then clearing overnight. Low 37F. Winds NE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High around 10C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 51F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 11C. E winds shifting to NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 52F. E winds shifting to NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 56F. SE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 56F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
